name: THORNYWAY
description: This game is a musical hardcore runner with mystical atmosphere of a world destroyed by deluge. There won't be any hints, you will have to discover the world on your own.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400 | or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti | Radeon RX 460 | or equivalent | Notebook GPUs are not supported at this time DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant
